content:
ICS 269, Winter 2006: Theory Seminar

The Theory Group meets Fridays at 1:00pm; this quarter we are in CS 253. Below is this quarter's schedule.

Jan 13: Organizational Meeting
Jan 20: Michael Nelson, The Rainbow Skip Graph: A Fault-Tolerant Constant-Degree Distributed Data Structure
Jan 27: SODA report
Feb 3: Nodari Sitchinava, Guard Placement For Wireless Localization
Feb 10: Josiah Carlson, Simultaneous Source Location on Trees
Feb 17: Johnathan Sun, Supervised Peer-to-Peer Systems
Feb 24: Kevin Wortman, Cake Cutting Really is Not a Piece of Cake
Mar 3: cancelled
Mar 10: John Augustine, Strip Packing with Precedence Constraints and Release Times
Mar 17: Matt Nguyen, Tight Approximation Algorithms for Maximum General Assignment Problems

Previous quarters' theory seminars
